All Courses Academic staff News Events Search Popular pages: Undergraduate Postgraduate PhD Accommodation Research International students Alternatively use our A-Z index. About 1. Education PhD in Electrical Engineering, June 2001, The University of Liverpool. MSc (Eng.) in Electrical Engineering (1993-1996), June 1996. Huazhong University of Science and Technology, China BEng in Electrical Engineering (1988-1992), June 1992. Huazhong University of Science and Technology, China 2. Employment The University of Liverpool, Reader: Oct. 2016 - now; Senior Lecturer: June 2013-Se. 2016; Lecturer, Sep. 2007 - May 2013. University of Glamorgan: Senior Lecturer, 09/2005- 08/2007, Department of Engineering. University of Sheffield: Research Associate, 02/2003 – 08/2005, Department of Automatic Control & Systems Engineering, EU project: “Flexible control systems development and integration environment for distributed systems”. University of Liverpool: Research Assistant, 01/2001--01/2003, EPSRC Ropa project: “Coordinated control of large-scale industrial dynamic systems”.
